short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notify if a webshop will try to deliver via a courier or a delivery method without providing enough/correct information to the user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It can happen that a webshop doesn't want to provide enough/correct information about the delivery method. This could be very annoying for a user that needs to try to figure out how to receive his goods in time. This extension provide a list of webshops that are know to follow this bad practice. In this way you can do a safe choice and be able to get your good in time and without wasting time travelling around or contacting the customer service. This is especially important before holidays (like Christmas) and for birthday presents. This extension helps you - for example - to avoid couriers like PostNord which has a very low score in Norway. But give you info also on many webshop about their couriers and options, who is using Posten, Bring, etc.
